senses.de: To manage or handle a problem or situation.
senses.ex: I will deal with this issue later.

Tips.title: Problem Focused
Tips.description: Used when you plan to address or settle a specific problem.
Tips.example: We'll deal with the leaking pipe first.

Tips.title: Delay Action
Tips.description: Indicates intent to handle a matter at a later time, not immediately.
Tips.example: I will deal with my email backlog after lunch.

senses.de: To take action to do something, especially to solve a problem.
senses.ex: The government needs to deal with the high crime rates.

Tips.title: Active Approach
Tips.description: Implies taking initiative to confront a challenge head-on.
Tips.example: You must deal with your fear of heights to be a pilot.

Tips.title: Call for Action
Tips.description: Suggests necessity or urgency to resolve the problem.
Tips.example: The mayor is pressured to deal with the housing crisis.

senses.de: To have as a subject; discuss.
senses.ex: The book deals with the issue of poverty.

Tips.title: Discussion Subject
Tips.description: Refers to the central topic being explained or talked about.
Tips.example: The seminar will deal with renewable energy alternatives.

Tips.title: Academic Tone
Tips.description: Common in educational or scholarly contexts.
Tips.example: Her thesis deals with neurological disorders.

senses.de: To accept and control a difficult emotional situation so that you can start to live a normal life again despite it.
senses.ex: She learned to deal with her grief.

Tips.title: Emotional Process
Tips.description: Indicates a personal process of adjusting to or handling feelings.
Tips.example: After the breakup, he had to deal with his sadness.

Tips.title: Personal Progress
Tips.description: Talks about coping with a situation to move forward in life.
Tips.example: She's dealing with her anxieties much better now.

senses.de: To trade or do business with someone.
senses.ex: I prefer not to deal with that company.

Tips.title: Business Interactions
Tips.example: Our firm does not deal with companies lacking eco-friendly policies.

Tips.title: Selective Partnerships
Tips.description: Choosing carefully who to engage with commercially.
Tips.example: We only deal with reliable suppliers to ensure product quality.
